name: ArbiGoat
additional_notices:
The following token has a variable tax function on the smart contract to change tax rates post deployment.
Do your own research and be careful if you are trading this token.

description.en: Welcome to ArbiGoat, where the goats are always lucky and the poker games are always hot! Join us on Arbitrum for a wild ride of Double Up Stud Poker, where you can double your fun and your tokens. But don't worry if you hit a streak of bad luck - our staking feature lets you recoup your losses and keep the party going. So come on down to ArbiGoat, where the stakes are high and the goats are higher!
